subject: feat(seed): auto-seed real tech industry demo data on first visit
body:
When IndexedDB is empty on first visit, seeds 40 nodes (12 companies,
10 people, 10 products, 8 acquisitions) and ~50 arcs with real,
publicly available data about major tech companies. Uses localStorage
flag to avoid re-checking after first load. Demonstrates labels,
properties, relationships, timeline dates, and graph analysis features.

Tags: seed, demo-data, first-visit, ux
Complexity: 3
Urgency: 2
Impact: user-facing
Risk: low
Debt: neutral
Epic: demo-data
Semver: minor

https://claude.ai/code/session_01MJJT4w8YukfxVmCpcMZeZB
title: auto-seed real tech industry demo data on first visit
